text: <!channel>: Hey ya'll! If you haven't already - could you DM me your responses to these questions? 1.) What is Uncorked Studios to you? 2.) Where do you think we should be focusing our energy? (mobile, hardware, strategy etc...) 3.) Do you have a dream project/client? 4.) Any other ideas and/or thoughts on the matter.  I'm trying to wrap up a deliverable for the leadership team and would love to get as much input as possible. Thanks!
<!channel>: show and tell in 10 in the new space.
